00022 /**
00023  * @file   ChipStreamDataTransform.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Wed Oct  7 16:45:33 PDT 2009
00026  *
00027  * @brief  Wrapper for ChipStream objects that makes them into DataTransform objects
00028  */
00029 #ifndef _CHIPSTREAMDATATRANSFORM_H_
00030 #define _CHIPSTREAMDATATRANSFORM_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/DataStore.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/ChipStream.h"
00035 #include "chipstream/DataTransform.h"
00036 #include "chipstream/SketchQuantNormTran.h"
00037 #include "util/Util.h"
00038 //
00039 
00040 /**
00041  * Wrapper for ChipStream objects that makes them into DataTransform objects
00042  */
00043 class ChipStreamDataTransform : public DataTransform {
00044 
00045 public:
00046 
00047   /** 
00048    * Constructor that takes ChipStream to use for algorithmic processing.
00049    * 
00050    * @param cStream ChipStream object we are wrapping.
00051    */
00052   ChipStreamDataTransform(ChipStream *cStream) {
00053     m_ChipStream = cStream;
00054   }
00055   
00056   /**
00057    * Destructor - Delete our chipstream object.
00058    */
00059   ~ChipStreamDataTransform() {
00060     Freez(m_ChipStream);
00061   }
00062 
00063   /** 
00064    * Core API. Take in a blackboard, a data store and output an updated blackboard and
00065    * possibly modified data store.
00066    * 
00067    * @param board Blackboard state input, to be updated as dictated by trasnform
00068    * @param in    Intensity level data to be transformed
00069    * @param out   Any intensity data post transform
00070    */
00071   virtual bool transformData(PsBoard &board, const DataStore &in, DataStore &out);
00072 
00073   /** 
00074    * Core API. Take in a blackboard, a data store and output an updated blackboard and
00075    * possibly modified data store. This class will use the ChipStream object it wraps
00076    * to do the actual numerics and handles the blackboard as well as marshalling data
00077    * in and out of the data store.
00078    * 
00079    * @param board Blackboard state input, to be updated as dictated by transform
00080    * @param in    Intensity level data to be transformed
00081    * @param out   Any intensity data post transform
00082    */  
00083   virtual std::string getName() { return m_ChipStream->getDocName(); }
00084   
00085 private:
00086 
00087   /// ChipSteam object that we are wrapping to get algorithmic implementation.
00088   ChipStream *m_ChipStream;
00089 
00090 }; 
00091 
00092 #endif /* CHIPSTREAMDATATRANSFORM_H */
